venue.name: Temple Beth David of the South Shore Parking Lot

item.description:
·     Swing into spring Uplifting your spirits with the sound of The Mood Swings!

Fee/$20.00 at the door.

The Mood Swings Orchestra is a big band, in the style of the traditional dance bands of the 1930s, 1940s and beyond. Under the direction of Judy George, the full band consists of 5 saxes, 4 trumpets, 4 trombones, piano, bass, guitar, drums, and vocalist. Our core personnel are all women.

Swing tunes make up the bulk of our repertoire. We also mix in some waltzes, foxtrots, tangos, rumbas, cha-chas, ballads, and the occasional polka.

·     Temple Beth David  www.templebethdavid.com presents a fun filled night for a fund-raising activity.  Dance lesson in the social hall at the beginning of the night so don't be late. 

 Your money pays for a dinner at.630pm. The surprise dance lesson is schuedule for 730pm and band 8:15pm. If you want food go early.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Swing Dance with lesson
